org.jetel.connection.jdbc

Class SQLIncremental

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.SQLIncremental

  • public class SQLIncremental
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class for incremental reading. For initialization it must be called updateQuery(DBConnectionInstance) method.
    Since:
    Jul 24, 2008

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQLIncremental

        public SQLIncremental(java.util.Properties key,
              java.lang.String query,
              java.lang.String incrementalFile,
              JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      ComponentNotReadyException
        Constructor for Incremental object
        Parameters:
        key - key definition, eg. key1=max(dbField)
        query - sql query in "incremental" form eg., select $f1:=db1, $f2:=db2, ... from myTable where dbX > #myKey1 and dbY <=#myKey2
        incrementalFile - file url with incremental key values
        jdbcSpecific -
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • updateQuery

        public java.sql.PreparedStatement updateQuery(SqlConnection dbConnection)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                              ComponentNotReadyException
        Prepares statement for reading data from database. Incremental key is substituted by its current value, and key definition is created from its description.
        Parameters:
        dbConnection -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition(java.sql.ResultSet result,
                  int keyNumber)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        updates values of incremental key from current result set
        Parameters:
        result - curent database result set
        keyNumber - number of incremental key
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getPreparedQuery

        public java.lang.String getPreparedQuery()
        Returns:
        query string for logging, with key names replaced by starting values

      • setQuery

        public void setQuery(java.lang.String sqlQuery)

      • getKey

        public java.util.Properties getKey()

      • mergePosition

        public void mergePosition(java.util.Properties position)
        Parameters:
        position - values of incremental key to be merged with current values of incremental key of this instance (keyRecord). Result of the merge is stored in position object.

        public JdbcSpecific getJdbcSpecific()
